ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c,"BIR Contractor"),ISPICKVAL( Resource_Type__c,"FLM Contractor")),ISPICKVAL(Company__c,''), OR(ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"(EFT)PROTEL INDUSTRIES LTD."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"(EFT)VIDEOSAT ELECTRONICS INC."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"2059605 ALBERTA LTD"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"COSERVE GLOBAL SOLUTIONS, LLC"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"FIELD NATION LLC"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"GCI COMMUNICATION CORP."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"GOBALASINGHAM, NEETH"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"INSPYR SOLUTIONS LLC"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"IT SOLUTION CLUB INC."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"MARKANDU, THUSEETHARAN"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"METE, PASQUALE (PAT)"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"POZIT TECHNOLOGIES INC."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"SCANPLUS LOCATING LTD."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"SINGH, SUKHCHAIN"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"TECH READY SOLUTIONS INC."), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"WESTPOINT TELECOMMUNICATIONS I"), ISPICKVAL(Company__c,"WORK MARKET INC.")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Company is required for Contractor ONLY
